headline.main: Excerpts From President's Speech: 'We Will Prevail' in War on Terrorism

lead_paragraph: Following are excerpts from President Bush's speech last night in Atlanta, as recorded by The New York Times: We meet tonight after two of the most difficult and most inspiring months in our nation's history. We have endured the shock of watching so many innocent lives ended in acts of unimaginable horror. We have endured the sadness of so many funerals. We have faced unprecedented bioterrorist attack delivered in our mail.
abstract: Excerpts from speech by Pres Bush on progress in war on terrorism (M)
